title: Instagram rolls out new parental supervision controls in the US
content:
In December, Instagram announced new parental controls to help parents and guardians control how much time their teens spend on Instagram. At the time, the company said the new tools would be made available in March 2022. As promised, the company has launched its new supervision tools. In a blog post on Monday, Instagram head

The post Instagram rolls out new parental supervision controls in the US appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Instagram's new parental tools are now available in the US. They will launch globally in the coming months. Read on.
